text: maṉitarkaḷ iṟakkumpoḻutum, iṟakkāmal nittiraiyil irukkum poḻutum allāhvē avarkaḷuṭaiya uyiraik kaippaṟṟukiṟāṉ. Piṉṉar, evarkaḷ mītu maraṇam vitikkappaṭṭatō avarkaḷuṭaiya uyirai(t taṉṉiṭamē) niṟuttik koḷkiṟāṉ. Maṟṟavarka(ḷiṉ uyirka)ḷai, kuṟippiṭappaṭṭa kālamvarai vāḻa avaṉ avarkaḷiṭamē aṉuppiviṭukiṟāṉ. Cintikkakkūṭiya makkaḷukku, niccayamāka itil pala paṭippiṉaikaḷ irukkiṉṟaṉa
